abstract: Vivien Schweitzwer reviews performance by soprano Dawn Upshaw as part of Peoples’ Symphony Concerts series at Town Hall.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Upshaw applied her soprano to an eclectic mix of classical songs at a show at the Town Hall.

headline.main: Review: Dawn Upshaw Gets Down to Earth at Town Hall
headline.print_headline: No Divas Here, but a Soprano With Style

snippet: Ms. Upshaw applied her soprano to an eclectic mix of classical songs at a show at the Town Hall.
